rooms.description: Grand entrance hall with Art Deco finishes and Vastu-aligned positioning to welcome positive energy.
Spacious living area with elegant Art Deco details, natural lighting through windows and a small balcony facing the east to harness morning light.
Modern dining space with Art Deco accents, strategically positioned according to Vastu for auspicious meals.
Fully equipped kitchen designed in an Art Deco style with energy-efficient layout and Vastu-compliant north-east placement for prosperity.

openings.description: Spacious balcony with decorative railing, providing a private outdoor space.

villa_features.details: Incorporates geometric patterns, bold colors and elegant details consistent with Art Deco style.
Each bedroom has a dedicated balcony offering privacy and outdoor living space.
